name: Magic Word Alchemist
description:
The Alchemists Lab Awaits
Magic Word Alchemist brings super fun word finding to your home PC. As the Alchemist, overcome challenging word puzzles to collect ingredients for your magical potions. Experience over 500 levels with thousands of hidden words as you complete all 6 magical potions. Get stuck? Use the letter shuffler to rearrange and view your word puzzle from a new perspective. Still stuck? Don't worry with Magic Word Alchemist there are no paywall or in app purchases, you receive free fortune potions(hints) as you play. With thousands of words and hundreds of levels Magic Word Alchemist offers hours of content and a plethora of replay value. Put on your wizards hat and join in on the fun.FEATURES:500+ Levels
Thousands of words
Letter Shuffler
Hint System
High Replay Value
Hours of fun
NO In App Purchases
NO Content Behind Paywalls
